statements: SELECT * FROM sensationalism_headlines
SELECT headline_text, sentiment_score FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY headline_id DESC
SELECT * FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE headline_text LIKE '%exciting%'
SELECT headline_id, headline_text FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE sentiment_score < 0.0
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_sentiment_score FROM sensationalism_headlines
SELECT * FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY headline_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT headline_text FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE sentiment_score < 0.0 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC
SELECT headline_id, headline_text FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE headline_text LIKE '%scandal%'
SELECT * FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE headline_text IN ('Breaking News', 'Exclusive Story')
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM sensationalism_headlines
SELECT * FROM sensationalism_scores ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT headline, score FROM sensationalism_scores WHERE score > 0.5
SELECT id, headline FROM sensationalism_scores WHERE score < 0.2 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT SUM(score) AS total_score FROM sensationalism_scores
SELECT headline, sentiment FROM headline_sentiments
SELECT * FROM sensationalism_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT headline, sentiment FROM headline_sentiments WHERE sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT headline, score FROM sensationalism_scores WHERE score > 0.5;
SELECT headline, sentiment FROM headline_sentiments ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensationalism_scores WHERE headline LIKE '%breaking news%';
SELECT * FROM sensationalism_headlines;
SELECT headline_text FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE headline_id = '12345';
SELECT headline_text FROM sensationalism_headlines ORDER BY headline_text ASC;
SELECT keyword FROM headline_keywords WHERE headline_id = '54321' AND keyword LIKE '%exciting%';
SELECT headline_text, sentiment_score FROM sensationalism_headlines JOIN headline_sentiments ON sensationalism_headlines.headline_id = headline_sentiments.headline_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT headline_text FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE headline_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
SELECT headline_text, sentiment_score FROM sensationalism_headlines JOIN headline_sentiments ON sensationalism_headlines.headline_id = headline_sentiments.headline_id;
SELECT headline_text FROM sensationalism_headlines WHERE headline_id IN ('11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111', '22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222');
SELECT headline_text, keyword FROM sensationalism_headlines JOIN headline_keywords ON sensationalism_headlines.headline_id = headline_keywords.headline_id;
SELECT DISTINCT headline_text FROM sensationalism_headlines;
SELECT * FROM headlines;
SELECT headline_text, publication_date FROM headlines ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT headline_text FROM headlines WHERE headline_id = 1;
SELECT headline_text, sentiment_score FROM headlines JOIN sentiment_analysis ON headlines.headline_id = sentiment_analysis.headline_id;
SELECT keyword_text FROM keywords;
SELECT headline_text, publication_date FROM headlines;
SELECT keyword_text FROM keywords WHERE keyword_id = 1;

SELECT headline_text, publication_date, keyword_text FROM headlines JOIN headline_keywords ON headlines.headline_id = headline_keywords.headline_id JOIN keywords ON headline_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.keyword_id;
SELECT headline_text, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM headlines JOIN sentiment_analysis ON headlines.headline_id = sentiment_analysis.headline_id;
SELECT headline_text, publication_date, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM headlines JOIN sentiment_analysis ON headlines.headline_id = sentiment_analysis.headline_id;
SELECT id, headline FROM headlines;
SELECT headline_id, sentiment_score, analyzed_at FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT keyword, headline_id FROM keywords ORDER BY keyword DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM entities WHERE entity_type = 'person';
SELECT headline_id, analysis_date, positive_keywords, negative_keywords FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT headline FROM headlines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT headline_id, sentiment_score, analyzed_at FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT keyword, headline_id FROM keywords WHERE keyword LIKE '%market%' ORDER BY headline_id ASC;
SELECT headline, entity_name, entity_type FROM headlines h JOIN entities e ON h.id = e.headline_id;
SELECT headline_id, analysis_date, positive_keywords, negative_keywords FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
